title: What Is Driving A 4x Jump In Beyond Meat’s Revenue By 2020? - Nasdaq.com
text: Beyond Meat ( BYND  ), one of the fastest growing food companies in the US, offering a portfolio of plant-based meat, has seen its total revenue increase by 5.4x in the last two years, from $16.2 million in 2016 to $87.9 million in 2018. Beyond Meat's revenue is expected to increase another 4x from the current level, from $87.9 million in 2018 to $358 million in 2020, thus adding a whopping $270 million to its revenue base over the next two years, compared to an addition of $71 million over the previous two years.

You can view the Trefis interactive dashboard -  Beyond Meat Revenues: How Does Beyond Meat Make   Money?   - to better understand the revenue trends and division-wise revenue performance, and alter the assumptions to arrive at your own estimate for the company's revenues. In addition, here is more  Consumer Staples data   .
As Beyond Meat offers a very unique and innovative product (plant-based meat), let us first understand its business.
As per  Beyond Meat Valuation   by Trefis, we have a price estimate of $128 per share for Beyond Meat's Stock  .
